Posts.Title: How Many Are We? zarovka SimonH

Posts.Content: Jul 15, 2012 01:43PM ChristineR66 wrote: Try not to worry and remind yourself to take it moment by moment.  That was one thing that helped me thru the waiting for the diagnosis...The waiting was THE WORST thing about this process so far and I'm already thru 6 of my 8 chemos.  At least once you find out, you know what it is that you have to deal with and it's a matter of putting one foot in front of the other.   You can do this and we are all hear for you. My tumor grew to 9.5X11 centimeters and I had a mammo and an US...the doctors told me that it was probably just scar tissue since I had breast implants and nothing was showing on the Mammogram!!  So you can believe that when it came time for the scans that I was fearing the worst..that it was all over my body..but..it wasn't.  I did a lot of praying...in fact, I think I've been closer to God in the past 3 mos than I've been in my life.   Hang in there!!! Ktlb04:  I have had the EXACT same situation with my left rib side...my surgical oncologist said it's nothing to worry about and it's muscalatory.  Who knows..the scans showed nothing.  I have sugery and a node biopsy in September so we'll see if it's in my nodes at all.
Posts.Title: waiting on staging tests and scared steviesmom kltb04

Posts.Content: Dec 11, 2012 04:22AM ChristineR66 wrote: Syl969...you can and ABSOLUTELY will survive!!! This is a journey...hang on and we will be there for you!!! XOXO
Posts.Title: 14 positive nodes ... can i survive? Syl1969 Jubby

Posts.Content: Dec 11, 2012 04:16AM ChristineR66 wrote: Hi ladies, so wonderful to hear everyones stories. I'm doing a 2nd round of chemo (carboplatinum, gemzar and herceptin) after 8/9 lymph nodes still showed cancer to the visible eye when I had my mastectomy. Seems the cancer flipped or orig pathology report didint show Her2+...would you believe?!?! Argh...but I'm doing well and each day gets a little easier. The initial diagnosis and shock back in April of this year was the worst. Hang in there ladies....just keep swimming, swimming, swimming :)
Posts.Title: 14 positive nodes ... can i survive? Syl1969 Jubby
